title: Sen. Danforth: The Republican supporting an Independent to defeat a Republican
description: Former Sen. John Danforth (R) represented Missouri in the Senate for three terms until 1995. Before that he was the state attorney general but today he is bankrolling a Super PAC that's helping prop up independent senate candidate John Wood. Chuck talks to Danforth about his motivation and how politics have changed.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
